verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> He was <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "There was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G3623>steward,<s%> and <S%G3778>this<s%> [steward] was <S%G1225>reported<s%> to him as <S%G1287>squandering<s%> his <S%G5225>possessions.<s%>

"And he <S%G5455>called<s%> him and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>'What<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> I <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> you? <S%G591>Give<s%> an <S%G3056>account<s%> of your <S%G3622>stewardship,<s%> for you <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2089>longer<s%> be <S%G3621>steward.<s%>'

"And the <S%G3623>steward<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G5101>'What<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G3754>since<s%> my <S%G2962>master<s%> is <S%G851>taking<s%> the <S%G3622>stewardship<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> from me? I <S%G2480>am<s%> not <S%G2480>strong<s%> <S%G2480>enough<s%> to <S%G4626>dig;<s%> I am <S%G153>ashamed<s%> to <S%G1871>beg.<s%>

'I <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> I shall <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3752>when<s%> I am <S%G3179>removed<s%> from the <S%G3622>stewardship,<s%> they will <S%G1209>receive<s%> me into their <S%G3624>homes.<s%>'

"And he <S%G4341>summoned<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of his <S%G2962>master<s%>'s <S%G5533>debtors,<s%> and he [began] <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G4214>'How<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> do you <S%G3784>owe<s%> my master?'

"And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'A <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G943>measures<s%> of <S%G1637>oil.<s%>' And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1209>'Take<s%> your <S%G1121>bill,<s%> and <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G5030>quickly<s%> and <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G4004>fifty.<s%>'

<S%G1899>"Then<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2087>another,<s%> 'And <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> do you <S%G3784>owe<s%>?' And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'A <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G2884>measures<s%> of <S%G4621>wheat.<s%>' He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1209>'Take<s%> your <S%G1121>bill,<s%> and <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G3589>eighty.<s%>'

"And his <S%G2962>master<s%> <S%G1867>praised<s%> the <S%G93>unrighteous<s%> <S%G3623>steward<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he had <S%G4160>acted<s%> <S%G5430>shrewdly;<s%> for the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>age<s%> are <S%G5429>more<s%> <S%G5429>shrewd<s%> in <S%G1519>relation<s%> to their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1074>kind<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G5457>light.<s%>

"And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5384>friends<s%> for <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> by <S%G1537>means<s%> of the <S%G3126>mammon<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness;<s%> that <S%G3752>when<s%> it <S%G1587>fails,<s%> they may <S%G1209>receive<s%> you into the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4633>dwellings.<s%>

"He who is <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in a <S%G1646>very<s%> <S%G1646>little<s%> <S%G1646>thing<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G4183>much;<s%> and he who is <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> in a <S%G1646>very<s%> <S%G1646>little<s%> <S%G1646>thing<s%> is <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G4183>much.<s%>

<S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you have not <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in the [use of] <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> <S%G3126>mammon,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> will <S%G4100>entrust<s%> the <S%G228>true<s%> [riches] to you?
"And <S%G1487>if<s%> you have not <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in [the use of] that which is another's, <S%G5101>who<s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> you that which is your own?

<S%G3762>"No<s%> <S%G3610>servant<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2962>masters;<s%> for <S%G2228>either<s%> he will <S%G3404>hate<s%> the <S%G1520>one,<s%> and <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2087>other,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2228>else<s%> he will <S%G472>hold<s%> to <S%G1520>one,<s%> and <S%G2706>despise<s%> the <S%G2087>other.<s%> You <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3126>mammon.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> who were <S%G5366>lovers<s%> of <S%G5366>money,<s%> were <S%G191>listening<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> and they were <S%G1592>scoffing<s%> at Him.

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "You are <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1344>justify<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts;<s%> for that which is <S%G5308>highly<s%> <S%G5308>esteemed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> is <S%G946>detestable<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

"The <S%G3551>Law<s%> and the <S%G4396>Prophets<s%> [were proclaimed] <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G2491>John;<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2097>preached,<s%> and <S%G3956>everyone<s%> is <S%G971>forcing<s%> his <S%G971>way<s%> into it.

"But it is <S%G2123>easier<s%> for <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2762>stroke<s%> of a <S%G2762>letter<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> to <S%G4098>fail.<s%>

<S%G3956>"Everyone<s%> who <S%G630>divorces<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> and <S%G1060>marries<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3431>commits<s%> <S%G3431>adultery;<s%> and he who <S%G1060>marries<s%> one who is <S%G630>divorced<s%> from a <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G3431>commits<s%> <S%G3431>adultery.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> there was a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> and he habitually <S%G1737>dressed<s%> in <S%G4209>purple<s%> and <S%G1040>fine<s%> <S%G1040>linen,<s%> <S%G2165>gaily<s%> <S%G2165>living<s%> in <S%G2988>splendor<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>
"And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G4434>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> was <S%G906>laid<s%> at his <S%G4440>gate,<s%> <S%G1669>covered<s%> with <S%G1669>sores,<s%>

and <S%G1937>longing<s%> to be <S%G5526>fed<s%> with the [crumbs] which were <S%G4098>falling<s%> from the <S%G4145>rich<s%> man's <S%G5132>table;<s%> <S%G235>besides,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G2965>dogs<s%> were <S%G2064>coming<s%> and <S%G7078>licking<s%> his <S%G1668>sores.<s%>

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that the <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G4434>man<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> and he was <S%G667>carried<s%> <S%G667>away<s%> by the <S%G32>angels<s%> to Abraham's <S%G2859>bosom;<s%> and the <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G4145>man<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> and was <S%G2290>buried.<s%>

"And in <S%G86>Hades<s%> he <S%G1869>lifted<s%> up his <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> in <S%G931>torment,<s%> and <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3113>far<s%> <S%G575>away,<s%> <S%G3113><s%> and <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> in his <S%G2859>bosom.<s%>

"And he <S%G5455>cried<s%> out and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3962>'Father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me, and <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus,<s%> that he may <S%G911>dip<s%> the <S%G206>tip<s%> of his <S%G1147>finger<s%> in <S%G5204>water<s%> and <S%G2711>cool<s%> off my <S%G1100>tongue;<s%> for I <S%G3600>am<s%> in <S%G3600>agony<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5395>flame.<s%>'

"But <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5043>'Child,<s%> <S%G3403>remember<s%> that <S%G1722>during<s%> your <S%G2222>life<s%> you <S%G618>received<s%> your <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>things,<s%> and <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> <S%G2556>bad<s%> <S%G2556>things;<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> he is being <S%G3870>comforted<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> and you are in <S%G3600>agony.<s%>

'And <S%G1722>besides<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G3342>between<s%> us and you there is a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5490>chasm<s%> <S%G4741>fixed,<s%> in <S%G3704>order<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G1224>come<s%> <S%G1224>over<s%> from <S%G7071>here<s%> to you may not be <S%G1410>able,<s%> and [that] <S%G3366>none<s%> may <S%G1276>cross<s%> <S%G1276>over<s%> from <S%G1564>there<s%> to us.'
"And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3767>'Then<s%> I <S%G2065>beg<s%> you, <S%G3962>Father,<s%> that you <S%G3992>send<s%> him to my father's <S%G3624>house<s%> –

for I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> – that he may <S%G1263>warn<s%> them, <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> of <S%G931>torment.<s%>'
"But <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'They <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> and the <S%G4396>Prophets;<s%> let them <S%G191>hear<s%> them.'

"But he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3780>'No,<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G4198>goes<s%> to them from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> they will <S%G3340>repent!<s%>'

"But he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1487>'If<s%> they do not <S%G191>listen<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses<s%> and the <S%G4396>Prophets,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> will they be <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G450>rises<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>'"
